title: Polar ecology: predators and prey
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles and Mark McCarty
brief_description: Illustrates the interaction of animals in the Arctic and Antarctica regions. Documents principles of ecology governing predator-prey relationships, food chains, territories and breeding success of selected animal species.
